comment: при клике на обжи на свалке в начале главы

languages.text: Мертвецы, сброшенные сюда откуда-то сверху, шепчут о том, как прекрасен был их долгий полет и как жестока оказалась твердь, разбившая их остывшие тела.
These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.
languages.original_text: Мертвецы, сброшенные сюда откуда-то сверху, шепчут о том, как прекрасен был их долгий полет и как жестока оказалась твердь, разбившая их остывшие тела.

traits.locale_text: These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.
These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.
These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.
These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.
These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.
These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.

languages.text: この死体は上空からここに落ちてきた。長い降下の素晴らしさと、冷たい体を砕いた衝撃の残酷さについて、彼らがささやく声が聞こえる。
languages.original_text: These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.

traits.locale_text: この死体は上空からここに落ちてきた。長い降下の素晴らしさと、冷たい体を砕いた衝撃の残酷さについて、彼らがささやく声が聞こえる。

languages.text: 这些尸体都是从上面掉下来的。你听到它们低声谈论漫长的下降过程有多么美妙，以及残酷的撞击如何破坏了它们冰冷的身躯。
languages.original_text: These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.

traits.locale_text: 这些尸体都是从上面掉下来的。你听到它们低声谈论漫长的下降过程有多么美妙，以及残酷的撞击如何破坏了它们冰冷的身躯。

languages.text: Estos cadáveres cayeron aquí desde arriba. Les oyes susurrar sobre la belleza de su largo descenso y la crueldad del impacto que rompió sus fríos cuerpos.
languages.original_text: These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.

traits.locale_text: Estos cadáveres cayeron aquí desde arriba. Les oyes susurrar sobre la belleza de su largo descenso y la crueldad del impacto que rompió sus fríos cuerpos.

languages.text: Diese Leichen sind von oben heruntergefallen. Du hörst sie flüstern, wie schön die lange Reise nach unten war und wie grausam der harte Aufprall, der ihre kalten Körper gebrochen hat.
languages.original_text: These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.

traits.locale_text: Diese Leichen sind von oben heruntergefallen. Du hörst sie flüstern, wie schön die lange Reise nach unten war und wie grausam der harte Aufprall, der ihre kalten Körper gebrochen hat.

languages.text: Ces corps ont atterri ici en tombant du conduit au plafond. Vous les entendez murmurer sur la beauté de leur longue descente et la cruauté de l'impact qui a brisé leurs corps.
languages.original_text: These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.

traits.locale_text: Ces corps ont atterri ici en tombant du conduit au plafond. Vous les entendez murmurer sur la beauté de leur longue descente et la cruauté de l'impact qui a brisé leurs corps.

languages.text: Bu cesetler yukarıdan düşmüş. Uzun düşüşlerinin güzelliği ve soğuk bedenlerini kıran darbenin zalimliği hakkında fısıldaştıklarını duyuyorsun.
languages.original_text: These corpses fell down here from above. You hear them whispering about the beauty of their long descent and the cruelty of the impact that broke their cold bodies.

traits.locale_text: Bu cesetler yukarıdan düştü. Uzun düşüşlerinin güzelliği ve soğuk bedenlerini kıran darbenin zalimliği hakkında fısıldaştıklarını duyuyorsun.
